name: Bandit Activity
description: Bandits have begun to prey upon your kingdom!
resolution: You can end this continuous event with a critical success on the check. Alternately, if the PCs are eager to seek out the bandits, the GM could build a short side quest to play out their attempt to defeat them.

criticalSuccess.msg: The bandits are captured, run off, or defeated, and merchants can confidently ply their wares. @lose1d4Unrest, and during the next Kingdom turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Economy-based checks.

success.msg: The bandits are prevented from preying upon your people, but they continue to be active. @lose1ResourceDiceNextTurn

failure.msg: The bandits plunder caravans and remote storehouses, and merchants grow cautious and afraid. @gain1Unrest and <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-dice" data-mode="lose" data-turn="next" data-multiple="false" data-value="4">Lose 4 Resource Dice Next Turn</button>

criticalFailure.msg:
Bandits rampage the land, and even start to encroach into your settlements. @gain1d4Unrest, increase a Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife
, and at the start of your next Kingdom turn your Resource Dice are halved or , whichever results in a lower total.
